text_block_list.text: It's already been several days since my career as a horse girl trainer in Tracen Academy began.
Walking through a nearby shopping arcade as I went on a stroll, I came across-

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: The last box's been brought in, granny!!

text_block_list.name: Elder Greengrocer Lady
text_block_list.text: My, what quick work…! Thank you, sweetie. Weren't they heavy?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Oh, not at all! Back in my homeland, Hokkaido, I always helped my Mom out with farm work!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Boxes of vegetables can bring it on!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Enough about me. Does your back still hurt, granny?

text_block_list.name: Elder Greengrocer Lady
text_block_list.text: Not anymore. It's gotten a whole lot better, thanks to you.

text_block_list.name: Elder Greengrocer Lady
text_block_list.text: That aside, aren't you a Tracen student? I'm sorry I interrupted your training. Thank you very much for voicing your concern.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Don't mention it! Now then, I'll head back to campus! Take good care of your back~!

text_block_list.name: Elder Greengrocer Lady
text_block_list.text: Oh dear… She took off the other way… I wonder if she'll make it back alright…
…Concerned, I went after the girl.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Phew! It's the first time I've ran this far out. This really was a nice outing for a change~…Wait!!!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Where in the world am I!?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: W-W-W-W-What now!? It's almost curfew for my dorm…!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huh!? Uhh, who might you be…?
choice_data_list: I'm a trainer. I'll lead you back.
I'm a trainer. I'll lead you back.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: You will!? Thank you so much!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: You're a lifesaver~ ~ ~! I wouldn't have made it back in time if it weren't for you!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, I got down to training on my own since I have an important race tomorrow, but I might've gotten too absorbed in it…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Still, I've only just moved in from the countryside, so I'm anything but accustomed to the metropolitan streets. You were a great help!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Ah, Spe-chan! There you are…! I was worried about you. You still weren't back after curfew.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ahh, Suzuka-san! I'm sorry to have worried you…!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Uhh, well then, Trainer-san! Thanks again for your help! I'll be taking my leave now.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: See you ~!!
Special Week bade goodbye with a smile, and Silence Suzuka greeted me with a slight nod, as the two headed back to the Ritto Dormitory together.
The next morning-

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Good morning, Trainer-san! The "Selection Races" are finally commencing!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: When a horse girl goes through a phase when her running abilities begin to blossom, they become eligible to participate in this quarterly event!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: All participating horse girls devote themselves to showing off their strengths, in hopes of being scouted by Trainers.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: We will no doubt witness another heated series of races this time around!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Likewise!!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: -Trainers are the pillars of horse girls. Sometimes supporting, sometimes shepherding, trainers all root for the girls as they walk the lasting path to glory… And that is your role.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: I sincerely wish you may meet a partner worthy to entrust.

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: With that said, I wish you a good day!!
Thus kicked off the Selection Races, in which participating horse girls of great might drew the attention of trainers, one after another.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: I, am, Number, One!! The Condor soars high, to the boundless skies!!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Now! Which Trainer would like to do the honors and pair up with me!?
But one of them outshined the rest, with her striking run-!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Heading down the home stretch, the pack has just passed the 4th corner! Under the spotlight runs the transfer student Special Week, at 3rd place, and 2 horse lengths behind the lead!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: …Now!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Here comes Special Week, making a ferocious spurt towards the front, and swiftly pulling ahead!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: I'm not done yet!!…Haaaaaaahhh-!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Pulling further and further away from the 2nd runner, Special Week, coming in first- zooms past the finish line!!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant… I did it, first place…!! With this-

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huh? You're the trainer yesterday! Did you come see me run!!?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ehehe! Thank you! I'm glad I get to demonstrate my capabilities to you.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Now that I'm here in Tracen Academy, I will make my debut, and realize my dreams…!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yes!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: The "Twinkle Series", the pinnacle of horse girl races, that only the selected ones get to take part in…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Atop that grand stage, I want to run and win lots of races. I want to become unmatchably strong! And then-

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Someday, I'll become Japan's No. 1 horse girl! And I'll have my Moms be witness to the peak of my glory!!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: That's my dream!!
With earnest eyes, Special Week declared her ambitious dream!
Through her sparkling eyes, it was as if the dazzling future she'll one day reach was coming into view…!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Huh? U-Uhh… Helloooo? Sorry, did I just blurt out something weird!?
choice_data_list: I want to support you in your dreams!
I want to support your dreams!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Wha?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: N-No way, I'm being so scouted!? M-May I!?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yes, gladly…!! I hope we get along well, Trainer-san!!
And thus, I became in charge of training Special Week!
